alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Gonzales; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 1:18PM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Guadalupe, west central Gonzales, northern Wilson and east central Bexar Counties through 200 PM CST... At 118 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Berlin, or 12 miles southwest of Seguin, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, McQueeney, St. Hedwig, La Vernia, Marion, Kingsbury, Santa Clara, New Berlin, Zuehl, Geronimo, Leesville, Nolte, Zipp, Belmont, Friendly Corner, Bebe, and Monthalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
